page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content: OF THE PEOPLE SURVEYED 53% WERE FOUND TO WORK OUTSIDE THE HERNE BAY AREA AND 47% WORKED OUTSIDE OF HERNE BAY. THE MAJORITY WORKING IN HERNE BAY WERE INVOLVED WITH SERVICES SUCH AS HEALTH CARE IN NURSING AND RETIREMENT HOMES, TOURISM, SHOPS AND BANKING AND BUILDING SOCIETIES. OF THOSE WORKING AWAY FROM HERNE BAY 29% WORK IN THE CITY OF CANTERBURY, 7 MILES DISTANT. CANTERBURY IS THE {DOMINANT TOWN}OF THE LOCAL AREA, AND PROVIDES NUMEROUS OPPORTUNITIES FOR EMPLOYMENT. 19% WORK IN LONDON AND USUALLY COMMUTE BY RAIL. THE MAJORITY OF THE REST WORK ELSEWHERE IN KENT, THOUGH SOME ARE INVOLVED WITH OVERSEAS WORK ON LONG TERM CONTRACTS. UNEMPLOYMENT IS ON THE INCREASE IN THE AREA AND SEASONAL VARIATIONS AFFECT THIS TOTAL.
